body:
The Officials have began on the discussion of a map testing event, but we need your help.

We want as many teams to participate as possible so please message me on Discord (LFT/Walt#7169) or Skype (swagishighyouislow) with a good time for your team to scrim.

We have planned the possible map testing event on Saturday, the 4th of March, but may get set back to a later date depending on how many teams are able to part take in this event.

We may host another one before the tournament, if we get more map submissions. We're mainly looking for 2 CTF maps and 2 tiebreakers.

Maps being tested:

       (5CP/KoTH)
  • Monthand
  • Fossil
  • Powerhouse
  • Draxel
  • Sunset Horizon
           (CTF)
  • Frozen Horizon
  • Alpine TE
  • Yukon
  • Endurance

replies.body:
That's an xml feature

That's an xml feature

(according to austin anyway)

recover-timeTime after a flag is dropped before it is respawned at it's post.Duration30
can confirm the latter is xml feature

will find out about the former. But seriously, it's not the gamemode, it can do almost the same shit as OCN. It's just the XMLs are shit.
